article_title: Obamacare Is A Cesspool Of Cronyism

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Crony capitalism is one of the central defects of Obamacare. It also explains why we haven't been able to reform Medicare despite 50 years of trying. Achieving a health care system that maximizes quality while minimizing costs through innovation is possible only by moving in the opposite direction of Obamacare.
